inn1.comm: a gentle loosener bowled on a good length outside off stump, a hint of away movement there, Dilshan lets it go
good length outside off and swinging away a touch, left alone to the keeper

whoaa!! playing across the line and almost losing his off stump, pitched much fuller just a hint outside off stump and zips away from Dilshan as he tries to work that away towards square leg. MIssed it completely and is lucky to still be out there
too wide outside off and going away further, overstepped at well, free hit coming
bang! Slower ball pitched full on middle, Dilshan picks it and gets under it nicely, heaves it over midwicket for a one bounce four
back on target, full on middle and off and moving away, Dilshan covers it well, opening the face at the last moment to guide it to point

close shout for lbw, good length on middle and leg, seemed to be sliding down, Dilshan gets forward to defend, is struck on the pads and Shoaib goes up immediately. Asad Rauf, however, turns it down. Replays indicate Dilshan was struck in line and the ball may have gone on to clip the bails. Too close to call there.
starts of with a no-ball, a big one, bowled on a good length outside off from wide of the crease, edged and falls well short of second slip
short and wide and gets the treatment, cut away well over point, falls just short of the boundary
good length on the off stump, pushed to mid-off for a quick single
pitched outside leg and swinging into middle, tries to hoick that over midwicket, misses it and is struck high on the pads
no-ball again, full on the pads, driven to mid-on
lucky to get away with that one, slower ball bowled full on middle and leg, strikes it uppishly towards midwicket, mistimed it there
short of a length outside off and going away with the angle, thinks of cutting it initially, withdraws at the last moment
short of a length outside off, gets on the back foot and punches it straight to point
short of a length outside off, Jayasuriya lets it go
full outside off and begging to be hit, Jayasuriya plants his foot forward and lofts it over extra cover for an easy boundary
edged and just over Younis Khan at first slip, good length outside off again, he slashed at it and the ball flew off the outside edge and over Younis even before he could react
much fuller and equally well played, dropped on the off side short of mid-off for a quick single
short of a good length just a touch outside off, Dilshan gets on the back foot, makes some room, and cuts it between point and cover for a boundary. Positive start from the Sri Lankan openers here
poor bowling from Shoaib, banged in short on middle, Dilshan rocks on the back foot and pulls it majestically over square leg for a one bounce four.
on the stumps this time, pitches on a good length on the off stump, Jayasuriya gets forward and defends that watchfully back to the bowler
straying on the pads, the batsman shuffles across to work it away fine, is hit on the pads and they steal a leg bye
slightly short on middle and leg, tries to ship it away off the pads, is struck on the thighs
short of a length outside off, thinks of upper cutting it over slip, withdraws wisely as the ball didn't bounce as much
full on middle and off, gets forward to defend, the away movement produces a thick outside edge to point
just slightly short on middle and leg, pulled away comfortably over midwicket for a boundary. Confident batting.
starts off well, bowls full in the channel outside off stump and swinging in sharply, Jayasuriya lets that go
short of a good length outside off, pushed off the back foot to cover.
on middle and leg, not giving the batsman any room here, pushed wide of midwicket for a quick single

Almost! Short on middle and leg, he stays his ground and paddles it away just wide of leg slip for a boundary. Well played in the end, was confident he could pull it off despite the close-in fielder placed there exactly for that shot
beauty! Kicked off the pitch and deceived Dilshan with the late away movement.
excellent delivery again, getting some good bounce here, landed on a good length on the off stump, gets a stride forward to defend, hits the handle before dropping into the off side
poor ball, rank long hop on middle, Jayasuriya gets on the back foot and just helps it on its way to the fine-leg boundary.
much better line, short of a length on the off stump, defended off the back foot to the bowler.
good length on the off stump, defended off the front foot into the off side
spat off the pitch again, landed on a good length but bounced sharply and swung away too as Jayasuriya tried to negotiate that off the back foot

hit-wicket, what an unfortunate way to get out, short outside off, pushes  it wide of cover and sets off for a single but his back foot just clips the stumps while he was attempting that shot. Crucial breakthrough
short on the off stump, defended back to the bowler
the bowlers maintaining a short of a length line here, outside off stump again, but closer to the stump preventing the batsman from cutting, left alone
fuller on the off stump, pushed confidently back to the bowler off the front foot
sharp bounce again, short outside off and a hint of inward movement there, left alone
short of a length on the off stump, pushed off the back foot to cover
continues to bowl in that channel on and outside off, defended solidly off the front foot
short and wide and there to cut, misses it. Maiden over
full on the off stump, defended on the front foot to cover
on the off stump and moving away, left alone
pushed into the on side for a quick single
short of  a good length outside off, left alone to the keeper
hitting the pitch hard on a good length on middle and off, defended on the off side
fuller on the off stump, defended watchfully on the off side
good length outside off stump and holding its line, left alone to the keeper
short and wide and Sangakkara cashes in, cuts away away between cover and point for a boundary
good length on the off stump, gets a stride forward and defends it back to the bowler
in that channel outside off stump again, a probing line, left alone
and again, a touch wider there, left alone to the keeper. Sangakkara taking no chances here
much closer to the off stump, but still wide enough for Sangakkara to shoulder arms
good length on the off stump, dropped onto the leg side for a single wide of midwicket
on the pads and Sangakkara flicks that way through square leg for an easy boundary
short of a good length outside off, left alone to the keeper
dropped onto the off side for a quick single
poor ball, banged in short on middle and leg, gets on the back foot and pulls it away over the short-fine fielder for a boundary
much fuller on middle and off, driven back to the bowler off the front foot
full outside off stump and a hint of away movement, left alone to the keeper
and again, Sangakkara is consistently leaving deliveries that are bowled outside the off stump
full outside off, driven off the front foot straight to cover
full again and pierces the gap this time, wide again and he gets on the front foot to drive it beautifully between cover and mid-off for a boundary
shot! Similar shot but played much straighter, driven wide of mid-off but Shoaib Malik dives well to his right to prevent a couple of runs
good length outside off and swinging away, Dilshan lets that go
pitched short of a length on middle and off, gets on the back foot and pushes it wide of midwicket for a quick single
full on the off stump, gets on the front foot to push it to cover
oversteps this time, short on the off stump, worked away wide of midwicket off the back foot for a quick single
misses out, banged in short on middle, gets on the back foot to slog it away over midwicket, gets the top edge that lands short of Afridi at cover
good length outside off and Sangakkara lets it go again. He's taking no risks here, the ball carries at a good height to the keeper

run out, dropped onto the leg side and Sagakkara scampers down the wicket for a quick single, Umar Gul picks up the ball and throws down the stumps at the non-strikers end turning back, Sanga is short by a mile. Another big wicket and Sri Lanka have themselves to blame for the two mishaps thus far
appeal for lbw, struck in line of middle no doubt but he played it, got a thin inside edge onto the pads to a ball that landed on a good length on the stumps
fuller outside off stump and holding its line this time, left alone
shot! Full outside off stump, leaning into the drive to place it wide of Shoaib Malik at mid-off, who chases well to keep the batsmen down to three
short on the off stump, there to pull but keeps a touch low, Dilshan fails to connect well, gets an inside edge onto his thighs
short of a length outside off and a hint of away movement there, left alone to the keeper
length ball outside off stump, Dilshan makes room and slices that away well wide of point for a boundary
good length outside off, left alone to the keeper
good length outside off stump, prods at it off the back foot, but he's beaten by the away movement
nicely behind it this time, defended off the back foot short of cover
on the pads this time, pushed off the back foot to mid-on
worked away off the back foot wide of midwicket for a quick single that was well judged though
edged  and fell just short of Younis Khan at slip, good length on the off stump, pushes at it lazily off the front foot, gets a thick edge but Younis is a touch too deep to pounce onto that one
Dilshan gets another boundary, a good length ball followed by an overpitched half-volley that gets the treatment, creamed through point and cover
short of a length outside off, pushed off the back foot to point
short and wide but keeps low on Dilshan who tries to cut that off the back foot, the ball whizzes past his bat straight to the keeper
watchfully played, full outside off stump, he gets forward and drives it firmly to mid-off
good length outside off stump, a testing line here, Dilshan, who's looked aggressive in this innings, lets that go
poor ball and Dilshan gives him no respect this time, it's short and wide and there to cut, Dilshan does exactly that, places it powerfully wide of third man for a boundary
similar ball but much wider, reaches for a cut, fails to make contact
stuck powerfully again but in front of square straight to deep cover
on the pads, worked away wide of midwicket for a single
oversteps and gifts Sri Lanka a free hit, full outside off, dropped onto the off side
pitched short on middle and off, Kandamby has prepared himself for a hoick over midwicket and despite not getting it on the right length, he goes through with the shot to get a couple
pushed through the off side off the front foot for a single
defended off the front foot to cover
quicker ball landing full on the off stump, Dilshan tries to steer that wide of point, gets an inside edge onto his pads
flighted on the off stump, paddled away towards fine leg for a single
flighted outside off stump, gets across and pushes it to deep midwicket for a single
tossed up on middle and off, defended on the pitch off the front foot
short on the off stump, gets on the back foot and punches it wide of point for a single
tossed up outside off, dropped onto the off side and they set off for a quick single
short and wide, tries to cut, chops it down on the bounce to the keeper
turned wide of midwicket on the front foot for an easy single
flighted on the off stump, turned away towards fine leg
short outside off, tries to paddle it towards fine leg, misses it completely
short and wide, misses out, cuts it straight to point
flighted outside off, paddled to fine leg
the googly, spun into the left hander from outside leg stump, pushed short of square leg for another run
bowled quicker on the pads, swept uppishly to fine leg for a single
flighted outside off, driven down the ground to long-off. 100 up
worked away towards square leg off the back foot, waiting for the ball to pin into him from outside leg
short on middle and off, pulled away to deep square leg
flighted on middle and leg, driven to deep midwicket on the front foot
tossed up on the off stump, defended on the off side on the back foot
tossed up on leg stump, turned away towards fine leg for a run

dropped, quicker ball that spun away sharply after landing on the off stump, tries to defend off the back foot, gets a thick outside edge and Akmal puts it down behind the wickets. Straightforward chance that
quicker ball again on middle and leg, defended on the leg side
flighted outside off, gets on the front foot to defend
worked away towards square leg for a single
short and wide, cut away straight to deep point, calls for a second but is sent back wisely
Afridi continues to bowl offspinners to Kandamby, on a good length on middle and off, defended solidly off the front foot on the off side
short and wide, waits for it to spin into him, cuts it uppishly towards point
guided wide of point off the back foot
turned away off the back foot towards square leg
lands on leg stump and spinning further down, given a wide
on middle and off, pushed off the back foot to midwicket
worked away to short-fine, no run there
flighted on the off stump, pushed wide of cover for a quick single and he gets to his 15th ODI fifty
almost done in by the quicker one, didn't anticipate that, lands on a good length on the off stump and almost goes through his defences, manages to get an inside edge onto the leg side
drive back to the bowler off the front foot
defended on the leg side off the back foot
worked away wide of midwicket for a single
short on middle, gets on the back foot and pulls it powerfully but straight to deep midwicket
driven down the ground to long-on for a single
fifty partnership, short and wide, cut away to deep point off the back foot. They;ve steadied the innings after Sangakkara's fall
flighted on middle, gets on the front foot and closes the face to glance it towards short fine for a single
on middle and leg, is down the track and flicks it away to deep square leg
flighted outside off stump, pushed off the front foot wide of cover for another single
cut away to deep point off the back foot
misfield that allows a boundary, short on middle and Dilshan pulls it away wide of Umar Gul at deep square leg who dives to his left but allows the ball to go through him
flighted on middle and leg, driven straight to midwicket
flicked away straight to square leg
cut away to deep point
defended off the back foot on the off side
gets on the front foot to defend, gets a thick outside edge wide of point
pulled away in front of square, towards long-on for a single
tossed up on middle and leg, tries to sweep it over square leg, is hit on the thighs
pulled away to deep square leg for a single
tossed up on middle and off, defended off the back foot to the bowler
chopped down to point off the back foot
flighted outside off, pushed off the back foot wide of cover where some lacklustre fielding allows the batsmen to steal a single
flighted on the off stump, tries to sweep it in front of square, gets the top edge but it lands safely well short of Umar Gul at deep square leg
on the off stump again and spinning away, guided to point for an easy single
flighted on middle and leg, pushed off the back foot to deep midwicket
pushed off the back foot to deep midwicket again
flighted on leg stump, driven back to the bowler
and again, watchfully played back to Afridi
shot! Short outside off stump, Kandamby rocks back and pulls it away in front of square, bisecting the gap between long-on and deep midwicket for a well hit boundary
flighted on the off stump, flicked away wide of midwicket for a single
tossed up outside off, swept in front of square for a single
short on middle and leg, gets on the back foot to work it away to deep square leg
tapped off the back foot to deep midwicket, short of a length on middle and off
flighted outside off, pushed uppishly wide of Malik for a single to long-off
short outside off, chopped down to cover point.
poor start, short and wide outside off, there to cut, Dilshan misses, rightly given a wide
shot! Short on middle and leg, pulled away well but straight to deep square leg
full outside off, gets on the front foot and opens the face to play it to deep point for a single
nipped back in sharply, landed on a good length outside off and swung in, Dilshan gets on the back foot and punches it wide of cover for a single
bouncer banged in short on middle and off, Kandamby ducks under it comfortably
short of a good length outside off, pushed off the back foot wide of cover for an easy single
full and wide down the leg side, Akmal dives well to his left to collect. 150 up
short on leg stump, whipped away stylishly off his pads to fine leg
tossed up outside off stump, Kandamby gets down on his knee and slog-sweeps it between long-on and deep midwicket for a boundary
pushed wide of cover to get to his highest ODI score
the sweep does the trick again, tossed up on middle and leg, Dilshan sweeps it powerfully wide of deep square leg who runs to his left but has no chance to cut that off
pushed off the front foot wide of midwicket
punched off the back foot down the ground to long-off
driven down the ground to long-off for another single
short outside off, struck away to deep cover off the back foot
good length on middle and leg, misses out, tries to glance it down fine, is struck high on the pads
short of a good length outside off, defended to point off the back foot
short on the leg stump, turned away towards deep square leg for a single

gone! Dilshan throws away his wicket! That was short on middle and he went for a mighty pull over square leg, got the top edge and Misbah-ul-Haq judged it to perfection standing at fine leg. Out almost in an identical fashion to yesterday
banged in short on middle and leg, worked away to fine leg off the back foot
down the leg side, given a wide, the first conventional legspinner by Afridi to Kandamby
short on middle and off, defended off the back foot
flighted on leg stump, turned away wide of midwicket for a single
turn and bounce! Spun away sharply after landing on a good length outside off, Mahela withdrew from a cut
too wide outside off stump, left alone
flighted on middle and leg, pushed into the leg side for a single
tossed up on the off stump, pushed back to the bowler
full on leg stump, drive down the ground to long-on for a single
short on the off stump, guided to point off the back foot
slower ball pitching on a good length on middle and cutting away, pushed to point off the back foot
on middle and leg, pushed off the back foot wide of midwicket, there's a yawning gap between long-on and deep midwicket and they get a well-run couple
banged in short from wide of the crease, angling into the left hander, Kandamby drops it down on the off side with soft hands
short on middle, dropped onto the leg side off the back foot for a quick single
short outside off, cut away to point
just tapped to long-on off the back foot
flighted outside off, pushed back to the bowler
short and wide, cut away in front of square towards deep cover for a couple
pushed off the back foot to deep midwicket
flighted on leg stump, pushed wide of midwicket again for another run. Fifty for Kandamby, his first in ODIs. Good knock
141.7 kmph from Shoaib, short of a length on middle and leg, turned away off the back foot to square leg
short and wide, cut away straight to Afridi at point
short outside off, gets on the back foot and pulls it away in front of square, wide of a diving midwicket. Well placed and long-on running to his left hand no chance
good length on the off stump from well wide of the crease, defended on the off side to cover

shot, Shoaib continues to bang it in short and gets the treatment. That was just 130 kmph and Kandamby repeats the earlier stroke, pulling it to the left of a diving midwicket for another boundary through the vacant gap on the leg side
short and wide, chopped down to point off the back foot
short and wide, cut away to point, fails to pierce the gap there

went through him! Kept low there, pitched on a good length outside off, just fractionally wide of the off stump, and spun away, Mahela failed to get his bat  down in time and the ball clipped his back pad on the way to the keeper. Replays indicate there was an inside edge, but a really tough chance there for the keeper.
pushed off the front foot to long-off
pushed into the off side for a single off the front foot
tossed up on the off stump, reaches forward to defend it back to the bowler
worked away wide of midwicket off the front foot for a single
good length outside off, defended wide of cover for a quick single. Sensible batting
short of a good length outside off, pushed off the back foot to Afridi at point

first lapse in concentration for Kandamby! Good length outside off, he tries to pull that away over midwicket despite the length not being right for that stroke, misses, and Mahela has a word with him straightaway

Iftikar does the trick, the bowling change works! Good length outside off and he plays through the line this time, but does so very lazily just pushing it uppishly to Shoaib Malik at short cover who pouches it with ease.
edged straightaway, good length outside off, he prods at it and gets a thick outside edge wide of first slip to third man for a single
short outside off, dropped on the off side with soft hands, played away from his body there, gets an easy single
tossed up on middle and leg, pushed to deep midwicket for a single off the front foot
short and wide, cut away powerfully to deep cover from the crease. Well struck
flighted outside off stump and spins away, Mahela's not interested in chasing that one
pushed off the back foot wide of point for a single
flighted on the off stump, lunges forward to defend back to the bowler
full outside off, driven off the front foot to deep cover for a single
short of a length outside off, struck wide of cover for a single
good length on the off stump, defended watchfully on the front foot to cover
and again, defended back to the bowler, fuller on the off stump this time
short and wide, placed between cover and point for a single
bouncer banged in short on middle, the batsman ducks under it comfortably, but a still a dot ball
full and wide and swinging away a touch, goes for an expansive drive through the coves, misses
short and wide, cut away to deep point
full outside off, square driven to deep point off the front foot
tossed up on middle and off, turned away wide of square leg for a single
full outside off, driven firmly off the front foot to deep point
bowled much flatter on the off stump, pushed back off the front foot to Malik
shot! Mahela's first boundary in 11 innings! Short outside off, waits for it to spin into him, late-cuts it well wide of point for a welcome four
good length on the off stump, dropped off the front foot wide of point for a single
short and wide, fails to put it away, chopped down to point off the back foot
short on middle, rolls his wrists over it nicely to help it on its way to fine leg
good length outside off, waits for it and upper cuts it to third man for a single
guided to third man off the back foot for another run.
wide, banged in short on middle, it's too high

slower ball that the batsman fails to pick, short of a length on the off stump, he prepares himself for a pull but checks his shot at the last moment, the ball hids the handle and lobs up on the off side
full on the off stump, pushed to mid-on off the front foot
short outside off, run down to third man for a single
down the leg side, pitched on leg stump and went down further with the angle, given a wide
bowled from well wide of the crease, lands on a good length on middle and leg, Kapugedara glances that down fine and the fine leg fielder had absolutely no chance of cutting that off
short and wide, cut away to third man off the back foot
much fuller outside off, Jayawardene guides that to third man off the back foot
slower, much too wide outside off, pushed wide of Younis Khan at point for a quick single
shot! Full on middle and leg, Kapugedera drives it through the gap between long-on and deep midwicket for a boundary. That was just a firm push but was timed beautifully
prods at a good length ball outside off that holds its line, misses
tries to drive this time to a full ball outside off, fails to make any contact
full on the off stump, pushed off the front foot straight to cover
short outside off, cut away in front of square to deep cover
full on middle and off, defended on the off side
slower ball bowled full on middle and off from round the wicket, pushed towards mid-on for a quick single
short of a length outside off, guided to third man for a single
short outside off stump, an attempted bouncer, left alone
full on the off stump, driven to cover off the front foot
slower ball on middle and leg, flicked wide of square leg for a single
full outside off again, Tanvir almost bordering on a no-ball there from bowling really wide of the crease, driven straight to cover
slower full bowled full outside off, driven firmly to mid-off, scampers down for a quick single
short of a length outside off, cut to point where the fielder fumbles to allow a run

gone! Good length just fractionally outside off, gets on the back foot to run it down to third man, gets a thick outside edge and Akmal takes a good catch diving to his right. Jayawardene looked good in his short stay at the crease.
full on the off stump, driven straight to mid-off, they set off for a quick single
edged again, short outside off but it's well wide of the keeper this time, rolls down to third man
full on middle and leg, driven through the massive gap between long-on and deep midwicket for three runs
why was that not given a no-ball? Too wide of the crease that time, full on the off stump, driven back to the bowler
misfield at mid-off that allows them an extra run, full on the off stump, driven to mid-off where Malik fumbles to help them get back for the second
bouncer banged in short on the off stump, one for the over
shot! Full outside off and Maharoof drives that on the up, well wide of mid-off for a boundary
went straight through, good length on the off stump and angling into the batsman, Maharoof pushes at it lazily, misses, and the ball gets to the keeper on the bounce
turned away to short fine leg
short and wide, gets the treatment, cut away over point and wide of third man for a boundary
makes room again but the bowler chases him this time, pushed to cover off the back foot
short on the off stump, opens the face to guide that to third man for a single
bouncer banged in short on leg stump, too high, given a wide
on target this time, good length on middle, pushed back to the bowler on the front foot
short on middle, pulled away over midwicket for three runs as Malik runs back and drags it back just short of the boundary ropes. 250 up for SL!
slower ball bowled full on the off stump, drags it uppishly towards long-on for a single
slower ball bowled full on the off stump, missed it completely, he gave himself room but failed to pick it, the off stump is pegged back
full toss on the off stump, driven to long-off and they come back hard for the second, a direct hit would have had hm short
oversteps, that pitched on a good length on middle and leg, gets a single on the leg side
full outside off stump, makes room and creams that over cover for a flat six. Length ball and got the treatment
driven towards mid-off for a single
slower ball bowled full outside off, makes room and slices it away over point for three runs. Third man runs to his left and cuts that off
good length on middle and off, defended back to the bowler
beaten, bowled full on the off stump and swung away, tries to push it towards mid-off, misses
full on the off again, almost yorker length, driven firmly down the ground towards long-off for a couple
yorker fired in on middle, dug out well by Thushara
short outside off, tries to slap it over mid-on, gets the top-edge that's snapped up easily by Kamran Akmal.
full on leg stump, dug out wide of midwicket for a quick single
short of a good length outside off, guided to point for a single
slower ball on the off stump, steered to short third man, picked it  and opened the face at the last moment
slower ball again, slogged over midwicket and a fumble in the deep allows them to come back for the second
full outside off, tries to drag it towards the on side, misses this time
short on middle and leg, tries to pull it away over midwicket, misses again.
length ball outside off stump, tries to heave it over midwicket, gets a thick inside edge towards deep square leg for a single
short outside off stump, swatted back past the bowler to long-off for a single
Shot! Short on the off stump, Murali ducks and pulls simultaneously, strikes it well enough to beat the fielder at deep square leg for a boundary
full on the off stump, comes down the track and just chips it over mid-off for a couple more
full on middle, makes room and drags it to midwicket, fails to pierce the field though, just gets a single
That's disappeared, attempted yorker gone bad, lands on a length on middle and leg, Kapugedera gets under it and smashes it over long-on for a massive six

gone this time, connected well but not well enough to beat Younis Khan at long-off, slower ball bowled full outside off and Kapugedara gets under it nicely again but strikes it straight to Younis who judges it well running a few steps to his left
full on the off stump, Murali shuffles and flicks that away straight to short fine leg

inn2.comm: full on middle, swinging in, Khurram gets on the back foot and flicks it away to fine leg
good length outside off and swinging away a touch, left alone to the keeper
full on middle and leg, gets on the front foot to drive it down to mid-on
full outside off, in the slot for Butt who creams it over cover for a boundary.
good length on middle and off, a bit of late away movement there, tries to defend on the front foot, gets a thick outside edge wide of point

gone! Nipped back in sharply, landed on a good length outside off and struck Khurram just in line of the off stump as he came forward to defend. Kulasekara went up immediately and the umpire, after some thinking, raised his finger. Close call, but seemed as though it would have clipped off.
short of a good length on middle and off, tries to work it away on the leg side, is struck high on the pads
good length on leg stump, turned away off the front foot to midwicket
full on the pads, flicked away wide of square leg for a boundary, Butt didn't have to get forward there, just a flick of the wrists and the ball flew off the bat
good length on middle and leg, defended on the leg side
continues to bowl straight, Butt flicks this away straight to square leg
beaten! Fuller on the off stump and swinging away after pitching, Butt pushes at it off the front foot but is done in by the away movement
short and wide, gets on the front foot and cuts it away between point and cover for a boundary. Confident start for Younis
full on middle and leg and swinging further down, strikes Younis on his pads as he tries to drive that past mid-on
inswinger again, good length on middle and off, defended watchfully towards cover
full outside off stump, mistimes a drive straight to cover
short of a length outside off, tries to cut it past point off the back foot, fails to connect well, gets a under-edge on the bounce to the keeper
gone! Bowled off an inside edge! Good length outside off stump, a hint of inward movement, tries to open the face to play it in the direction of point, gets a thin inside edge onto the off stump
short of a good length on leg stump, turned away wide of square leg for a single
jagged back in, short outside off, Misbah moves across to defend it off the back foot, gets an inside edge through his legs towards the leg side, they take a quick single
full on the off stump drawing Butt forward, he defends it solidly to cover
short of a good length outside off, guided to third man from the crease for a single

edged and caught-behind! Landed on a good length outside off and cut away sharply from Misbah, plays it away from his body and gets a thin outside edge straight to Sangakkara who pouches it comfortably.
good length outside off stump and going away with the angle, left alone to the keeper
full on the off stump, a hint of away movement, pushed back to the bowler off the front foot
full on the off stump, plays inside the line trying to push it towards mid-on, gets a leading edge wide of the bowler
solid in defense this time, good length on the off stump and reaches forward to push it to mid-off
a touch too wide outside off stump, left alone, given a wide
full outside off stump and moving away, Butt leans into the drive and plays it straight to mid-off
held it back a touch, pitched it short on middle and off, defended off the back foot on the leg side
short outside off, slashed away to third man for a single
short of a good length on the off stump, defended off the back foot to cover
bouncer banged in short outside off stump, Butt backs away
short of a good length outside off, chopped down to point off the front foot
cut away much more firmly this time, but Dilshan fields that well diving to his left at point
too straight, pitched on a good length on middle, pushed wide of mid-on for a single
short outside off, cut away to third man off the back foot
full outside off stump, struck firmly off the front foot to cover
beaten by the inward movement, pitched full outside off stump and jagged back in sharply just as Malik came forward to drive
this one almost had him out lbw, cut in sharply from a good length outside off, Malik had prepared himself for a cut and just managed to get his bat down in time to chop it down to point
fuller on the off stump, defended back to the bowler off the front foot
much straighter, on middle and leg, coming in with the angle, defended on the leg side

the frustration is clearly setting in here, good length on middle and off, Malik is nowhere to the pitch, he tries to loft it over mid-on from the crease, mistimes it but it lands safely and they come back for the second.
full outside off stump, Butt gets on the front foot and slices it away over point, wide of third man, for a couple
short on middle and off, an attempted bouncer, Butt looks to pull that away in front of square, misses

he's lucky this time, good length outside off and goes through with the drive despite not getting to the pitch, gets an inside edge that misses the leg stump by a whisker and rolls down the fine-leg boundary
jagged back in, good length outside off and Butt did well to adjust his shot at the last moment to drop into the off side
too straight, full on middle and leg, flicked away to square leg
short of a good length outside off, run down to third man off the back foot for a single
full on the off stump, pushes it crisply to mid-off on the front foot. Good sound of bat hitting ball
good length on the off stump, defended watchfully towards cover off the front foot
came back in, landed on a good length on the off stump and moved in towards middle, Butt had it covered nicely, pushed it to cover off the front foot
he'll feel he's missed out there, full on the pads, turned away straight to midwicket, fails to pierce the gap
a hint of away movement, hitting the pitch hard when pitching on a good length on the off stump, defended back to the bowler
dropped onto the off side towards mid-off for a quick single
driven crisply back past the bowler, full on the off stump and Butt just punches it down the track, the ball ricochets off the stumps at the non-strikers end to the long-off boundary
full outside off and Butt launches into this one, drives it well over mid-off for a one-bounce four
fuller on middle and off, pushed to the covers off the front foot
defended off the front foot into the off side, the cover fielder in the act again
good length on the off stump, pushed back to the bowler off the front foot
bouncer banged in short on middle and off, Butt ducks under. Good comeback by the bowler after being struck for boundaries off his first two balls
inswinger landing on a good length on the off stump, Malik pushes it back to the bowler off the back foot
good length outside off and moving away, left alone to the keeper
big one! Good length outside off and Malik struck that through the line, well over mid-off and the boundary ropes for a six
short of a length on middle and off, defended off the back foot on the off side
full on middle and leg, driven back to the bowler
full on middle and leg, driven wide of mid-on off the back foot for another boundary. Ten off that over.
poor start, full outside off and Butt has no difficulty smashing that through the covers for a boundary
much better, good length on middle and off, defended on the off side on the front foot
struck firmly through the off side again but SL have a fielder in the deep, Jayasuriya does well running to his left at deep cover to keep the batsmen down to a single
slower ball pitching on a good length on middle and off, defended off the back foot
good length outside off and Malik has a wild swing at it, gets a thick inside edge towards fine leg
full outside off, plays through the line to drive it towards mid-off, gets a thick outside edge in the direction of deep cover
shot! Full outside off and Malik pulls off a text-book cover drive to pierce the gap between cover and mid-off
slower ball bowled short outside off and cutting away, looks to cut, misses
full, almost yorker length on middle and leg, dug out back to the bowler
short outside off, run down to third man off the back foot
short of a good length on leg stump, tries to work it away off the front foot wide of midwicket, is struck on the pads, calls for a single but is sent back
much fuller outside off, waits for it and opens the face at the last moment to play it down tot third man for a single
good length on middle and off, turned away wide of mid-on for a single
almost! Hitting the pitch hard there, landed on a good length outside off, just marrginally, Malik tries to guide that to third man, the ball shoots off the pitch and Malik fails to make contact
a touch too wide and Malik has no trouble to guide it to third man this time
Butt continues on, full on middle and off, worked away on the leg side for a single
slower ball bowled full on the off stump, Malik fails to spot but manages to get his bat down in time to protect his pads, and his stumps
50 partnership! Full on the off stump and driven firmly back past the bowler and mid-on for a boundary all along the ground.
an offspinner to start with, short of a length on the off stump, pushed to cover off the front foot
offspinner again, guided to point off the back foot
shot! Flighted on middle and spins away, Butt is down the track and covers the spin well by lofting it wide of long-off, he just gets a run though, there's cover for Mendis in the deep
went straight on, bowled short and quick outside off, pushed to cover off the back foot
flighted and pitched full on middle and leg, flicked away wide of deep square leg for a couple

straighter one again, pitched on a good length outside off, paddled down towards fine leg where the fielder dives well to his right. The batsmen, though, just run a couple where at least three was on offer
short of a length outside off, guided to third man for a single
Malik does the same, short again outside off and the batsman has no trouble opening the face to take another single
short of a good length outside off, pushed off the back foot to mid-on
short of a good length on middle and leg, comes down the track and pushes it wide of mid-off for a quick single
slower ball pitched short and wide again, plays away from his body there, gets an inside edge onto his pads
short and wide again, chopped down wide of point for an easy single
flighted on middle and leg, turned away wide of square leg for a single
tossed up on the off stump,went straight on, pushed to long-off
offspinner again, tossed up on middle and leg, driven uppishly to long-on for a single
offspinner, spun away after landing on a good length outside off, punched through the covers for a single
offspinner again, flighted on middle and leg, turned away to square leg
flighted outside off stump, lands full, driven firmly to deep cover
short and wide, cut away powerfully wide of point, third man runs to his left to keep the batsmen down to two
short again, cut in front of point towards deep cover this time
full outside off, walks across and drives it straight to mid-off on the front foot
Slower ball bowled full outside off, tries to square drive it towards point, misses, and so does Sangakkara to allow the batsmen a bye
short outside off, run down to third man off the back foot
too wide outside off, misdirected slower ball, given a wide
short of a length outside off, the third man fielder is kep busy again, Butt has played a sensible knock here
offspinner, pitched full outside off, driven to deep cover
the legbreak pitched full on middle, driven to long-on
spun into the left hander from a good length outside off, Butt punches that down the ground to long-off
straight one, pitched on a good length outside leg stump, tries to work it away fine, is struck high on the pads
legbreak gone bad! Short on the off stump, Malik makes room and creams that through the covers for a boundary all along the ground. Well struck
short of a good length on middle and leg, spinning away from the right hander, pushed off the back foot wide of the bowler
full outside off, driven firmly off the front foot to cover
fifty for Butt, following up on his century in the first ODI! Plays the guide to third man once again, that shot has fetched him quite a few runs today. Excellent knock, his tenth fifty!
short of a good length outside off, gets on the back foot and turns it away wide of midwicket for a single
short of a good length outside off, chopped down to point from the crease
short of a length outside off, punched forcefully wide of deep cover for a couple
full outside off stump, driven down the ground to long-off for a single
flighted on the off stump, pushed to cover off the front foot
much flatter on the off stump, pushed down the ground to long-off
flat and quick on middle and leg, defended with a big stride forward
tossed up on the off stump, driven down the ground to long-off
flat on middle and off, Butt gets down on one knee and sweeps him behind square wide of fine leg for a couple
on the leg stump, turned away off the front foot wide of midwicket for a single
flighted on middle and off, Butt gets to the pitch and drives it down the ground to long-off
flighted outside off stump, a doosra, tries to drive it back to the bowler, gets a thick outside edge wide of cover for a single
and again, coming into Butt after pitching on the off stump, he picks it, turns it away wide of square leg for a single
tossed up on the off stump, driven to long-on off the front foot
short and wide and Butt cuts it away in front of square to deep cover
doosra gain but Malik spots it, full outside off and driven wide of cover for another easy single
fifty for Malik, bowled flat on middle and leg, swept away powerfully behind square leg for a boundary. Excellent knock
flighted outside off, pushed through the off side for a single
punched back to the bowler off the back foot
short on the off stump, tapped off the back foot to long-off
short on the off again, gets forward and pushes it firmly wide of the bowler to long-off

close shout for lbw, that looked out on first sight, but it isn't. That pitched outside leg and hit Butt in line with middle as he tried to guide that to point. Correct decision though, that pitched outside leg
flighted outside off, driven down the ground to long off for a single
tossed up outside off, opens the face to play it to point
drive straight to cover off the front foot
flighted on middle and leg, worked away towards deep midwicket for a single
tossed up on middle and off, pushed back to the bowler

gone! Big outside edge, short outside off stump and seemed to hold its line, Malik got onto the back foot to late-cut it past past, got a thick edge that was snapped up well by Sangakkara. The umpire gives the nod and Malik, after a well made 54, has to go back with his runner
tossed up outside off stump, pushed back to the bowler
short on middle and off, pushed back to the bowler off the back foot
punched off the back foot straight to short midwicket
struck straight to cover off the back foot

gone! Is it all over for Pakistan?? Short on leg stump and Butt tries to work it away off the back foot towards square leg, the ball seems to stop on him, he was a touch too early into the stroke, gets the top edge that's cupped easily by Mahela at cover
full outside off, driven firmly to cover
doosra, short outside off and spinning away, pushed off the back foot wide of cover for a single
good length on the off stump, defended watchfully on the off side
flat and quick on the off stump and that spun in sharply, Afridi did well to get behind it and defend it on the leg side, and get away from the strike
and again, short outside off, Kamran shapes up for a cut the ball zipped back in and he does well to push it to cover off the back foot
on middle and leg, turned away to deep square leg for a single
doosra! Full outside off and Afridi fails to pick it, he plays inside the line, Sangakkara takes off the bails but replays show he got his foot down in time
tossed up on middle and leg, pushed off the back foot to long-on
short outside off, paddled over the keeper towards fine leg for a couple
flighted on middle and leg, driven to midwicket on the front foot
flat and quick way down the leg side, Afridi doesn't bother chasing it, Sangakkara fails to collect it, and the ball rolls down to the fine-leg booundary
pushed firmly off the back foot wide of long-off
short of a good length on middle and off, pushed into the off side
worked away on the leg side for a single
tossed up well outside off, attempts to sweep it down square, misses, they get a leg bye anyway
short on middle and off, pushed off the back foot wide of midwicket for a single
flighted outside off, pushed into the off side wide of cover for a single
flighted outside off, driven straight to cover off the front foot

appeal for caught-behind, short on leg stump and spinning further down, Akmla tries to work that away towards the leg side, misses, and Sangakkara goes up. That wasn't given a wide, so it must have hit something. Probably flicked his pads on the way through
driven down the ground to long-on for a single
pushed into the leg side for a single
offspinner, full on the pads, driven wide of square leg for a single

tame dismissal! That was the straight one, pitched short outside off, Kamran rocked on the back foot to pull it over midwicket, expected that to spin into him, got the top edge and Sangakkara pouched it easily taking a few steps to his right
tossed up on middle and leg, driven wide of midwicket for a single
offspinner, short on middle and off, pushed off the back foot to cover
flighted on middle, goes straight on, Afridi gets down on one knee and sweeps it over square leg for a boundary

gone! Soft dismissal again! Flighted outside off stump drawing the batsman forward, Tanvir reaches for it and pushes it uppishly straight to Dilshan at short cover who takes a good catch diving forward
short outside off and spinning in, gets outside the line to defend, is struck on the pads
flighted outside off again, spinning in, clipping his pads on the way to first slip
flighted on the off stump and spun back in sharply, defended on the off side with bat close to pad

close shout for lbw, that was out but wasn't given by Asad Rauf, pitched on the off stump and spun in, Umar Gul came forward to defend but missed it, was struck in line with off and that would have gone on to hit middle and off
short outside leg, gets back to whip it away off his pads, misses
flighted on middle, driven back to the bowler off the front foot
pushed off the back foot to cover
offspinner, pitches on middle and leg, works it away to deep square leg
failed to pick the straight one and is given this time! Tossed up on middle, gets forward to defend, misses, is struck in line with middle and off and the umpire has no hesitation this time
straight one again, full on the off stump, pushed wide of point for a single
he's standing well wide of the stumps, short outside off and pushed off the back foot to long-off for a single

caught at deep midwicket! Curtains for Pakistan. Bowled flat outside off stump, Afridi gets down on one knee and attempts to slog-sweep that into the stands, Kulasekara standing in the deep takes a couple of steps back and cups it over his head inches inside the boundary ropes. Well taken and the stadium is emptying now with Afridi gone
flighted outside off, defended on the off side on the front foot
much flatter, full on the off stump, defended on the off side
down the leg side and given a wide
flighted on middle and leg, pushed into the leg side on the front foot
flighted outside off, gets forward to defend, gets an inside edge to short fine leg
tossed up on middle and off, defended watchfully back to the bowler
tossed up on the off stump, defended towards cover
pushed back to the bowler off the front foot
short on the off stump, defended off the back foot
tossed up on the off stump and spinning in, gets a huge stride forward to defend, is struck on the pads
short outside off, guided to point off the back foot
went straight on, quicker one outside off and the batsman had no answer to that one
flighted on middle and leg, pushed uppishly towards midwicket
short outside off, gets outside the line to defend, clips the pads to lob up over slip
shot! Flat on middle and leg, swept down wide of leg slip for a boundary towards fine leg
flighted outside off and spinning in, defended on the off side
flat outside off again, from round the wicket this time, defended wide of silly point on the front foot
tossed up outside off, defended towards point off the front foot
quicker one on middle and leg, defended on the leg side
short on the off stump and spinning into the right hander, defended to midwicket off the back foot
short outside off, pushed to cover off the back foot
flighted on middle and leg, turned away to fine leg
gone! It's all over! Flighted on the off stump, tries to defend with bat hidden behind pad, spins into the batsman, is struck on the pads and that would have gone on to hit middle and off
